ATTENTION EVERYONE WHO IS STUCK AT 98.38%!!
I have a fix!
By now the whole game and crack is downloaded, but not the update/patcher. So I googled for an alternative download and found a newer one, 1.0.6 instead of 1.0.4 (which is in this torrent). I also read that this version doesn't even check for cd-keys anymore, which means no crack needed!

So here are some install instructions that work for you that have downloaded 98% or more:

1. Un-rar the rar-files.
2. Mount the .toast file you get using the default DiskImageMounter
3. Copy the "Age of Empires III" application to your disk, like the application folder. Remember this location.
4. Go to: http://www.destineergames.com/support/updates/Age-of-Empires-III-1.0.6-Updater-(US).zip and download the zip-file
5. Unzip the zip-file
6. Run the "Age of Empires III 1.0.6 Updater (US)" application you get
7. Hit the "locate Age of Empires III" button and navigate to the application (the one from the .toast file)
8. Go through the rest of the updater and when it tells you to, close it.
9. Done! Go ahead and play! Multiplayer works like a charm :D
